name: thing-if
description: Javascript SDK for Kii Thing Interaction Framework.

scripts.build-test: rm -fr built && npm run build-src && tsc test/*/*Test.ts test/*/*/*Test.ts --target es5 --module commonjs --outDir built
scripts.test-cov: npm run build-test && istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec 'built/test/small/*.js' 'built/test/small/*/*.js' && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.test-cov-local: npm run build-test && istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- -R spec 'built/test/small/*.js' 'built/test/small/*/*.js'&& open coverage/lcov-report/index.html
scripts.large-test: npm run build-src && npm run build-test && mocha 'built/test/large/*.js' --timeout 20000
scripts.build-lib: rm -fr built && rm -fr lib && tsc && cp -fr built lib
scripts.build-doc: npm run build-src-for-doc && rm -fr jsdoc/html && jsdoc built-for-doc -c jsdoc/conf.json -R README.md

author: kii-corp
